thread.title: Debbie Reynolds died of burst blood vessel in brain during stroke
thread.title_full: Debbie Reynolds died of burst blood vessel in brain during stroke

author: KATE FELDMAN
title: Debbie Reynolds died of burst blood vessel in brain during stroke
text:
Debbie Reynolds died from burst blood vessel in brain during stroke, according to death certificate Debbie Reynolds died of burst blood vessel in brain during stroke Debbie Reynolds officially died of a burst blood vessel in her brain during a stroke on Dec. 28. (MIKE BLAKE/REUTERS) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS   6:27 PM 
Debbie Reynoldsâ€™ official cause of death was a stroke that burst a blood vessel in her brain, according to her death certificate, acquired by TMZ . 
The legendary actress died Dec. 28 at the age of 84 at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles, just a day after daughter Carrie Fisher died. 
Her son, Todd Fisher, was at her side at their LA home when she fell ill. Front page of the New York Daily News for Dec. 29. (New York Daily News)
